in 1959- decades before Jennifer Aniston , Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie made love triangles trendy.`` I'm really grateful the paparazzi isn't interested in me,'' Debbie Reynolds said, from her home in Los Angeles. When we had that thing with Elizabeth Taylor and Eddie Fisher , I had 100 people from the press in my front yard. I couldn't take my kids to the park, to the store, anywhere. It really angered me. And that's what celebrities now experience every day. I don't know how they do it. Debbie Reynolds said she's open to discuss most anything, including her`` three rotten husbands.''
